</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns name of unit's primary weapon (empty string if none). </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''primaryWeapon''' unit </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

<h3 style="display:none">Notes</h3>
<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->

<dd class="notedate">Posted on August 4, 2006 - 10:57
<dt class="note">[[User:Hardrock|hardrock]]<dd class="note">'''primaryWeapon''' tells you what weapon the unit has irrespective of the status of the weapon. For example a unit that has an M16 on his back will still report an M16 as its primary weapon.

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
